properties.name: 3rd President Mwanawasa's Burial Place
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Burial place of the 3rd President of Zambia

properties.name: Abundant Life Church
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Born again church offering self improvement training, if you are looking for a domestic worker / housekeeper etc, then this is not a bad place to start.

properties.name: Adventure City
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Gardens and recreation area. Rock Pools, playground area and water slides. Idea for a family day out. Take your picnic or braii. they will provide the Charcoal and Braii stand for a fee and will also sell Braii packs if you dont care to take your own. Take aways also available. There is also a indoor play park for the very young ones

properties.name: Alpha Bar
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam A hive of activity, where anything goes. If you want to take a walk on the wild side visit to lively bar known for all the \'Alpha\' females in the place! Leave your chat up lines at home they wont be necessary. This bar has always been on the airline crews \'Must See\' list for Lusaka because if you are new to town and wanting a fun lively environement this is the place.

properties.name: American Embassy
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Embassy Visa Section etc

properties.name: American international School (AIS)
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam If you are a non Zambian then you are eligible to enrole your kids at this International school, which boasts some of the best academic and sporting facilities in the country.

properties.name: Anglo American Building
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Office Building

properties.name: Avocado
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Spoil yourselve at this Day spa. Choose from a wide variety of beauty treatments and massages, including a traditional Zambian massage (Ukuchina).

properties.name: BP Shop
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam 24Hr Shop where you can buy Alcohol and other essentials! late into the night.

properties.name: Barclays Bank Zambia HQ
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam

properties.name: Barclays Premier Offices
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam

properties.name: Binnie executive Lodge
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Good small lodge usually full so call ahead

properties.name: Blue Crest Lodge
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Budget Accommodation and bar

properties.name: British high Commission
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Consullar section of the High Commission - Offices of DFID, and social bar for British Citizens.

properties.name: Butlers
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Other wise known as "The Chilenje Times", after \'Times Cafe\' at Arcades. Very popular as a football / sports bar. About 5 Flat screen TV\'s dotted around the place. Drinks are slightly more expensive than the other bars in the area, but then that is why it is a nicer bar. Great football watching venue. Serves basic food options ( Burgers and chicken & chips Not many expats venture here but only because it is off the usual beaten track. Try it out for a change.

properties.name: Buzz Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Relaxed \'Street\' Cafe and Bar. If they have it the brownies are worth having!

properties.name: CHACHACHA Backpackers
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam

properties.name: Cabinet Office / OVP
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam

properties.name: Care For Business Hospital
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Private Hospital and clinic, well equiped with surgery.

properties.name: Cathedral
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Catholic Cathedral

properties.name: Cathedral Of the Holy cross
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Anglican Cathedral - Sunday Services at 08:00 and 10:00 every Sunday except the 1st Sunday of the Month when service is at 09:00

properties.name: Cattleman's Grill
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Bar with Live Band and grills. Usually lively atmosphere

properties.name: Chaminuka Lodge
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Exclusive private game reserve and lodge. Excellent accommodation, offers game drives (vehicle or on horseback), fishing, legendary Sunday lunches. A must see when you are in Lusaka

properties.name: Chemist
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Chemist, nothing new here!

properties.name: Cherise's Kiddies Park
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Playground area for kids set up by Cherise Makubale, Zambian winner of Big Brother Africa

properties.name: Chimbokaila
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Lusaka\'s main prison. you dont want to pay a visit here. if you do make sure you befriend the cell captain. Keep him happy and you might just make it through!

properties.name: Chit Chat Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Relaxed cafe bar, good place to meet people for a coffee or meal. very popular at one time, regular disco nights on Fridays and Saturdays

properties.name: Diane's Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Quiet restaurant specialising in you doing your own cooking at a burner at your table. So if you enjoy barbequeing food at a table with good company try this out.

properties.name: Dil Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Indian Restaurant with wide variety of Indian & Chinese rdishes and a few western dishes. Does Take away

properties.name: Dutch Reform Church Craft Market
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Craft Market on the last Sunday of each month at the Dutch Reformed Church. Buy everything from Vegetables to art and crafts of varying quality. A meeting spot for the expat community, an a excellent place to get a taste of what is available around Lusaka. Excellent Burgers amongst many other foods on offer

properties.name: Dutch Reformed Church
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam

properties.name: Egyptian Embassy
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam

properties.name: Eight Reedbuck Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Luxurious all suite Boutique Hotel with unique modern African decor, taking its inspiration from Zambian Tribal customs and their colourful ceremonies.

properties.name: Eltoro
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Cafe serving tasty fayre of burgers chicken and they usually have daily specials of lasagna stews etc. They serve alcohol and are open for lunch and afternoon tea

properties.name: FAZ House
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Offices of the Football association of Zambia, and other organisations e.g. Share

properties.name: Family Favourite
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Inside Tukunka Mall, this is the best Liquor store in the country. A wide Variety of alcoholic drinks of every description. Don\'t go anywhere else if you want to find what you are looking for!

properties.name: Five a side astro turf - Italian Club
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam

properties.name: Food Fayre
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Fats Food restaurant and take away. Best Shawarmas in Town

properties.name: Fridays Corner
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam A well known landmark bar, but only visit if you dont mind drinking your cold beers on an empty beer crate!!

properties.name: Garden Centre
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Small garden nursery

properties.name: Garden Park
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Small aprk and garden centre

properties.name: Henry Tayali - Visual Arts Centre
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Permanent exhibiton of some of Zambia\'s new and established artists, using all manner of media

properties.name: House Gallery
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Gallery started by Patrick Mumba, one of Zambia most respected artists. Patrick does some exciting abstract work. He has put together an interesting collection of sculptures and paintings. Definately worth a visit.

properties.name: ISL multi purpose Hall
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Large recreation hall used regularly for concerts etc

properties.name: Immigration
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Need to extend your Visa or have an issue with your work permit. this is the place to go

properties.name: Indian High Commission
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam

properties.name: Iseni House
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Excellent art Gallery set in well manicured gardens. Well worth a visit, and an excellent place to sit and chill. Currently (July - Aug 09) running is an exhibition by Lawrence Yombwe on of Zambians established artists.

properties.name: Italian Embassy
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Consullar Section

properties.name: Italian Orthopaedic Hospital
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam If you are looking for an orthopaedic surgeon this well run hospital has some of the countries best consultants

properties.name: Jagoda
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Exquisite Gem stones and jewelry made by Ross and Clare. Also an excellent art and craft shop. A must visit.

properties.name: Johnny's
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Bar with outside pool tables. Club Nights on Friday and Saturday nights. Dancefloor over the indoor swimming pool. Serves chinese food. If you dont want to be found having a mid week drink, this is the place to go!

properties.name: Kalahari
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Bar restaurant and now a few comfortable rooms. A little bit disjointed but clean and simple

properties.name: L.A. Fast Foods
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam

properties.name: Leopards Hill Memorial Park
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam New Private Cemetary. Some sanity for the dead at last!!

properties.name: Leopards Hill Secondary School
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Private Secondary School offering day and Boarding

properties.name: Livestock Services
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam All you need if you are a farmer, or just need seeds, fertilizer or fencing, irrigation pipes, tanks etc. etc.

properties.name: Longacres Gardens
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Small play park well looked after courtesy of Barclays Bank

properties.name: Lusaka Baptist church
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam

properties.name: Lusaka Golf Club
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Entrance to the best kept course in the country. The front nine is challenging and the back nine more open with 4 par fives. Lots of water everywhere. There is a restaurant! if you want pies, chicken and chips or stews with Nshima, but not somewhere to impress a business associate.

properties.name: Lusaka Play House
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Under utilised theatre but occassionally puts on plays written by Local play writes.

properties.name: Lusaka Rugby Club
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Home of PowerHouse - Lusaka rugby team. They train every evening at 5pm. Bar open to members and their guests

properties.name: Lusaka Trust Hospital
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Formerly owned by the mines this private hospital offers basic medical care and services

properties.name: Lusaka Water and Sewerage Company
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam HQ of the LWSC where all faults and payments can be made / reported

properties.name: Marlin Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Marlin is known for their steaks, many would argue that they are the best in town! The food takes its influence from Raj\'s Mauritian heritage . You go to marlin for the Food not the Decor. Always busy, and I would recommend booking in advance

properties.name: Matebeto
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam At the back of the playhouse this no frills restuarant serves a buffet of local specialities every lunch time, catering to those office workers that want a cheap tasty and quick lunch. Try some Nshima, vegetables cooked in peanuts, grilled fish etc.

properties.name: Melissa Supermarket
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Its convenient, but they could be cleaner and more organised and you never get the feeling that things are fresh!!

properties.name: Milky Lane
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Ice Cream Parlour. Wide selection of Icecreams and Sundaes that the kids will love. Often at weekends there is a jumping castle that is free for kids to play on

properties.name: Ministry of Foreign Affairs
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam

properties.name: Mr. Petes Steak House
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Lusaka\'s original steak house. Has lost some of its shine and really needs a revamp, but if you are in town and need a bite to eat you wont go too far wrong with the steaks or Ribs here..

properties.name: Mr. Price Home
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Good Selection of home furnishings. Dont fight with the crowds at Manda Hill or in Town.

properties.name: Multichoice Zambia
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Main Offices of DSTV ( Satellite TV ) provider. Get subscriptions and equipment and service from this office

properties.name: Munda Wanga Botanical Gardens & Zoological Park
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Botanical Gardens Ideal for a quiet day out, Take your picnic basket and have a braii. The Zoological Park is interesting with animals in semi natural surroundings. Chimpanzees, Lions etc. Great for the Kids. The Feeding Tour starts at 14:00hrs each day.

properties.name: Muskaan Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Indian Restaurant serves similar food to Dil and the menu is identical

properties.name: Namwandwe Gallery
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Excellent Private art Gallery. Collection of works from some of Zambias finest and most respected artists. Definately woth a visit.

properties.name: National Assembly
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Seat of Zambia Parliament. The building is of architectural interest in that it is clad in Copper plate, a symbol of the mineral wealth of the country

properties.name: Nena's Guest House
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Bar and restaurant serving Yugoslav inspired food. House with some thatched rondavels, no particular effort made on decor.

properties.name: Nico insurance
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam

properties.name: Nigerian High Commission
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam

properties.name: O'hagans
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Sports Bar and Restaurant.

properties.name: Olympic Swimming
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam 50m Public pool. Open all day to the public, and in the evenings 17:00 Lusaka Dolphins swimming club train.

properties.name: Pearly Whyte
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Dentist of the highest quality. Efficient friendly with modern equipment. It almost makes it a pleasure going to the dentist!

properties.name: Petroda Petrol Station
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Petrol station with shop

properties.name: Police Service HQ
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam

properties.name: Polo Grill
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Bar and grill. Large Thatched roof, overlooking the polo field. In the winter they put out braziers to keep the punters warm The indoor bar shows English Premier league soccer matches live

properties.name: Portico
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Stylish Restaurant and Bar with Italian inspired food. Popular place to see and be seen.

properties.name: RTC
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam This is where you get your vehicle fitness certificate. Pay from across the road, and the officers in the car park check your car over and issue the cerificate.

properties.name: Rose Garden
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Excellent small garden centre with knowleageable friendly staff happy to advise and give tips on the plants that are for sale.

properties.name: SatCom Systems
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Electric Fences / Gates. CCTV access Control and wrought iron Specialists. If you are serious about security use a professional firm.

properties.name: Smugglers Inn
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Pub and casino! Serves pub grub and has cold beer on draft. Popular during the English Premier League and shows at least two matches at the same time. Want to play some pool have a chat and meet new people, or have a flutter.

properties.name: St. Andrews Church
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam

properties.name: State House
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Offices of the President of Zambia

properties.name: Steers & Debonaire Restaurants
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Steers serves Burgers and Fried Chicken Debonaires serves pizzas and subs. They deliver in the area. +260 211 268319

properties.name: SterKinekor Cinema
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam

properties.name: The Drip
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam If your looking for a small happening bar then the drip is for you. Off the beaten track, always packed. Definately one for the alternative pub crawl

properties.name: The Garden Club
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Quiet place to have lunch or a coffee surrounded by fish pond and greenery. Not a lot of people know this. The food is simple fayre but tasty and the service friendly. Those in the know find this an excellent informal meeting place

properties.name: The Jazz Club
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam No jazz, just bar! but a hive of activity especially on Friday and Saturday Nights, and whenever there is an English Premier League match on. Not for the faint hearted. Very much a local hangout.

properties.name: The Lounge
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Busy bar, young crowd, loud music, occasionally live bands and big screen for English Premier League Matches. Never a dull moment!

properties.name: The Moth Club
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Private members club, frequented by the old guard! (establishment!!)

properties.name: Traditional Zambian Food
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Nshima with beef / chicken stew and vegetables cooked in peanut butter. Simple tasty Zambian Fare.

properties.name: Trust Medical Centre
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Modern new hospital opened early 2009

properties.name: Tuesday Market
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Fresh Vegetables and spices, and some plants at the best prices in town. As the name sugests the market comes to town every Tuesday

properties.name: US Peace Corps
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Country office of US Peace Corps. Volunteers

properties.name: UTH - Cancer Hospital
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam University Teaching Hspital specialist cancer unit

properties.name: Wi Fi Hot Spot at Buzz Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam

properties.name: Woodlands Stadium
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Home of City of Lusaka Football Club

properties.name: Zain Headquarters
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam HQ of Zain the largest mobile network

properties.name: Zambia Police - Woodlands
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Local Police Station

properties.name: Zamtel Woodlands Exchange
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam PSTN office. If you have a fault with your landline, or need to pay a bill.

properties.name: Zesco Kamwala
properties.description: Posted by Shamzam Paypoint for your electricity bills. This is the main office that covers western/souther suburbs.
